name: GainRESV3 (Passive)
author: cf2lter
description:
Purpose: Anti aliasing / Deblur

To eliminate aliasing and general artifacts caused by not enough resolution while bringing out details Im stopping its training here because it's getting worse, i think of some aligment issues by game's rendering pipeline + downscaling...
dataset: 5K resolution shots from paladins rendered by 200% for hr and 37.5%(1080p) for lr then downscaled to 1080
